name: Aadee Chheda
headline: I build AI-powered products from idea to deployment — blending software engineering, machine learning, and business strategy to ship real systems used by real people.
about: I'm a Computer Science student at NC State and a Park Scholar with a strong focus on building scalable, production-ready AI systems. My experience spans full-stack development, cloud infrastructure, applied machine learning, and startup leadership. I enjoy working at the intersection of engineering and product — taking ambiguous ideas, architecting solutions, and turning them into shipped platforms.

education.degree: B.S. Computer Science · Minor in Business Administration
bullets: Park Scholar — full merit scholarship for leadership, service, and academic excellence
Strong focus on AI systems, software engineering, and entrepreneurship
Engineering an AI-powered culinary social platform that transforms short-form food videos into structured, high-fidelity recipes.
Designed and deployed a multimodal AI pipeline using GPT-4o and Whisper to extract ingredients, steps, and metadata from TikTok and Instagram videos.
Built a scalable backend using Modal and Supabase, with a Vercel-hosted React frontend for global distribution.
Founded and scaled a tech solutions startup delivering AI-powered software, websites, and automation tools for small and mid-sized businesses.
Built and commercialized autonomous AI chatbots and multi-agent systems to automate lead capture, scheduling, CRM updates, and customer support.
Architected and deployed cross-platform web and mobile applications using React, React Native, FastAPI, and cloud infrastructure.
Provide enterprise-level hardware and software support for Apple and Windows systems serving 30,000+ users.
Diagnose complex networking and authentication issues across OSI layers 1–3 and 7.
Serve as a technical liaison for students and faculty, translating system failures into actionable solutions.
Managed financial records, reconciliations, and reporting for multiple clients using QuickBooks.
Led client communication and assisted with tax documentation and financial insights.
Helped transition accounting workflows to cloud-based systems, improving efficiency and accessibility.
